com.cscguru.client.entities

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape
      • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
        • com.cscguru.client.entities.Entity
          • com.cscguru.client.entities.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IUpdatable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mob, Player

    public abstract class Agent
extends Entity
implements IUpdatable
    Abstract class used for players and mobs.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Agent

        public Agent(float x,
     float y,
     int tileX,
     int tileY,
     Sprite ss)
        Initializes an agent based on the passed parameters. Constructor also creates an actor using the sprite parameter. Sets the default facing value to Facing.SOUTH. Also constructs the hitboxes (bumpers) used for collision detection. This constructor is primarily used for players.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        tileX -
        tileY -
        ss -

      • Agent

        public Agent(float x,
     float y,
     int tileX,
     int tileY,
     Actor actor)
        Initializes an agent based on the passed parameters. Constructor stores the actor passed in. Sets the default facing value to Facing.SOUTH. Also constructs the hitboxes (bumpers) used for collision detection. This constructor primarily used for mobs.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        tileX -
        tileY -
        actor -
